references.paper_title: StyTr2: Image style transfer with transformers
references.reason: This paper introduces a novel transformer-based approach to style transfer, which is a key technique used in the current study and is compared against.

references.paper_title: DiffStyler: Controllable dual diffusion for text-driven image stylization
references.reason: This paper presents a dual diffusion model for text-driven image stylization, which is a highly relevant and comparable method used in this work for evaluating style transfer.

references.paper_title: LAION-5B: An open large-scale dataset for training next generation image-text models
references.reason: This paper introduces the LAION-5B dataset, which serves as a benchmark dataset for aesthetic evaluation in this study.

references.paper_title: Learning to evaluate the artness of AI-generated images
references.reason: This paper proposes a method for evaluating the aesthetic quality of AI-generated images, which is a key task being addressed and evaluated in this research.

references.paper_title: Chain-of-thought prompting elicits reasoning in large language models
references.reason: This paper introduces the chain-of-thought prompting method, which is a crucial technique used in this work to improve the reasoning ability of large language models in aesthetic evaluation.
